tool_description: this is a complete web-based solution designed to manage inventory systems, pricing for both passengers as well as train operators including sleeper compartments and cabins. Earlier it was a tidy job to book train tickets. A person had to stand in long queues and wait for long hours to make a reservation in advance.
name: railways travel
title: railways travel

api_list.name: mohd hamza_copy
api_list.description: Indian Railways API Endpoints Let us now take a detailed look at the Indian Railways API endpoints. PNR Status Check PNR stands for Passenger Name Record and is a unique number issued by the Indian Railways system per booking. The PNR status check endpoint returns the booking status of a particular PNR number.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://railways-travel.p.rapidapi.com/www.sparrowtravel.in"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "railways-travel.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
